mapper.sql: id as id, stu_id as stuId, tn_id as tnId, result as result, create_date as createDate, task_id as taskId
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO saas_jw_student_result ( stu_id, tn_id, result, create_date, task_id ) VALUES ( #{stuId}, #{tnId}, #{result}, #{createDate}, #{taskId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE saas_jw_student_result
stu_id = #{stuId},
tn_id = #{tnId},
result = #{result},
create_date = #{createDate},
task_id = #{taskId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE saas_jw_student_result
stu_id = #{map.stuId},
tn_id = #{map.tnId},
result = #{map.result},
create_date = #{map.createDate},
task_id = #{map.taskId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saas_jw_student_result ( stu_id, tn_id, result, create_date, task_id ) VALUES ( #{map.stuId}, #{map.tnId}, #{map.result}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.taskId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM saas_jw_student_result
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND stu_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.stuId} , '%')
AND tn_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.tnId} , '%')
AND result like CONCAT('%', #{condition.result} , '%')
AND create_date like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND task_id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.taskId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
